publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-976 Susan Deacon: LGBT Youth Scotland National Gathering, 5 to 7 March 2004-That the Parliament notes that the LGBT (Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual and Transgender) Youth Scotland national gathering is taking place in Edinburgh on 5 to 7 March 2004; commends the contribution made to the lives of young people by LGBT Youth Scotland in supporting this event; welcomes the inclusion of a Scottish Parliament outreach information session at the gathering, and welcomes the contribution that the weekend event will make to diversity and equality, encouraging all the young people participating to make their voices heard in building an inclusive Scotland. Supported by: Patrick Harvie*
S2M-976 LGBT Youth Scotland National Gathering, 5 to 7 March 2004 (lodged on 27 February 2004) Eleanor Scott*

S2M-976 LGBT Youth Scotland National Gathering, 5 to 7 March 2004 (lodged on 27 February 2004) Nora Radcliffe*, Shiona Baird*, Fiona Hyslop*, Robin Harper*, Pauline McNeill*, Sarah Boyack*, Rob Gibson*, Margaret Smith*
S2M-976 LGBT Youth Scotland National Gathering, 5 to 7 March 2004 (lodged on 27 February 2004) Chris Ballance*, Marlyn Glen*

S2M-976 LGBT Youth Scotland National Gathering, 5 to 7 March 2004 (lodged on 27 February 2004) Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Mr Keith Raffan*, Christine May*, Ms Sandra White*, Elaine Smith*, Mike Watson*, Iain Smith*
S2M-976 LGBT Youth Scotland National Gathering, 5 to 7 March 2004 (lodged on 27 February 2004) Frances Curran*
S2M-976 LGBT Youth Scotland National Gathering, 5 to 7 March 2004 (lodged on 27 February 2004) Mark Ballard*, Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-976 LGBT Youth Scotland National Gathering, 5 to 7 March 2004 (lodged on 27 February 2004) Tommy Sheridan*, Donald Gorrie*
